replies.body: That's what his lore says, so yes! Unless his eyes are actually his nostrils and his shell is covering most of his head like a big hoodie!$@#% http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/3/3d/Rammus_OriginalSkin_Ch.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20110327222141 :o Rammus's still adorbs though....and a pain in the beutocks when you have to keep asking your allies to stop auto attacking his W -.- https://images-eu.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/41wRqqHydtL.jpg http://orig07.deviantart.net/d1c5/f/2014/294/8/e/rammus___chibi_by_guilhermevlima-d83n38q.png
